justification: Assumes B “needs RB help” but only swaps Tier 3 RBs (no depth gain) and asks B to add a WR despite already-strong WR room and a fade of low-volume pass offenses. Ignores B’s 0-8 urgency for clear, immediate upgrades. A’s TE upgrade is marginal (both Tier 4). Trade is plausible but rationale is shallow and misses B’s incentives and roster context.
